tool_description: Unofficial API for the modern calendar of Bouayad, made from scratch.
name: BouayadAPI
title: BouayadAPI

api_list.name: Get current hijri month's salates times by city_id
api_list.description: Get current hijri month's salates times by city_id

api_list.name: Get today's salates times by city_id
api_list.description: Get today's salates times by city_id

api_list.name: Get hikams for today by city
api_list.description: Get hikams for the current/given date

api_list.name: Get cities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bouayadapi.p.rapidapi.com/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bouayadapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }
